Additional information and resources

Digital safety Accessibility & inclusion Digital competences AI & analytics Digital pedagogy theory

Technology is transforming the way we teach and learn. There are many concepts, ideas, and frameworks that can help us to comprehend and apply digital pedagogy and educational technology more effectively. In this section, we will dive into some of these perspectives, offering a brief overview of each along with some resources for further reading.

Adaptive Learning

This learning approach utilizes digital technology to tailor educational experiences to individual studentsâ€™ needs by analyzing and responding to their performance and interaction with digital content in real-time.

Digital Literacy

Digital literacy expands traditional literacy to include skills required for effectively managing and evaluating information across digital tools and media. This literacy covers diverse digital practices required today.
